name: Sparky
description: Sparky is a unique oscilloscope-themed robot with a playful feline twist. Its box-shaped body, classic buttons, and arms and legs resemble that of a traditional oscilloscope, while its vibrant screen displays an adorable cat design. This one-of-a-kind creation is a member of the WebtrES club, where it utilizes its specialized skills to analyze and interpret electronic signals in the digital realm.
